name: kafka-connect-file-pulse
title: Kafka Connect File Pulse
description: The Kafka Connect FilePulse Connector is a powerful source connector that makes it easy to parse, transform, and load data from the local filesystem, Amazon S3, Azure Blob Storage and Google Cloud Storage. This connector supports a variety of formats equally for all storage systems, e.g., text files, CSV, XML, JSON, Avro, Log4j, etc.

support.summary: This connector is supported by the open source community and StreamThoughts as part of its open source offering.
